trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when one or more exceptions have occurred at the CardSpace service level.
trans-unit.target: 當 CardSpace 服務層上發生了一個或多個例外狀況時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The cause of the error will be logged in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 造成錯誤的原因將會記錄在事件記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: Conditions that cause this exception to be thrown include:
trans-unit.target: 造成這個例外狀況擲回的情況包括：

trans-unit.source: The user interface is already being displayed.
There was an error in loading a store or ledger.
trans-unit.target: 載入存放區或 Ledger 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，其中保存有關擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化的資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，表示目前例外狀況的發生原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及此例外原因之內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException" /> 類別的執行個體。
